artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; naval battle scene; submarine in center, with several sailors on deck; several explosions in the water surrounding the submarine; ships covered by plumes of white smoke on right and left; explosions in a black sky; square section with text in Japanese characters and English script in URC of left image
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 5362 | on center sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 5362 | on right sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 5362
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: On February 8, during the Naval Battle at the Entrance of Port Arthur between the Two Japanese and Russian Fleets, Honor was Achieved when Our Torpedo Boats Sank Three Enemy Warships
